nodes.text: A Tholothian dirt-mole was a creature which hid by burrowing into the ground. The creature shared its name with the Colonies planet Tholoth. While in the custody of the Weequay pirates of the Ohnaka Gang, the Tholothian Jedi youngling Katooni thought of the dirt-mole, wanting to burrow herself into the ground like the creature could.
The Tholothian dirt-mole was mentioned in the short story "Almost a Jedi," written by Sarah Beth Durst and published in 2020 as part of the anthology book The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark.
